p: Serological assays were performed on 385 serum samples collected during routine surveillance carried out in July 2012 by the State Central Veterinary Laboratory of Mongolia. Additionally, archived serum samples collected during outbreak investigations that took place in 2007â€“08 (n = 160) and 2011 (n = 40) were available for this study. Serum samples collected by the Animal Health Trust in 2012 for unrelated studies from 60 Welsh Mountain ponies bred and kept in Shropshire, UK were also tested.
